component.text:
Activity

Enter the slash notation, number of host bits and number of hosts possible, based on the subnet mask displayed.

Enter the values to complete the entries for the Decimal Subnet Mask displayed. Click New Problem for a new value. Use a calculator if necessary to determine the number of hosts supported.
You have provided the correct slash notation, number of host bits, and number of hosts possible for the subnet. Click New Problem to try another value or click Next to continue.
Incorrect, please review subnetting principles and try again.
